notificationTemplate.name: hazard_assigned
notificationTemplate.title: 隐患已分配给您
notificationTemplate.content: 隐患 {{hazard.code}}（{{hazard.location}}）已分配给您处理，请及时整改

notificationTemplate.name: hazard_rectifying
notificationTemplate.title: 隐患整改中
notificationTemplate.content: 隐患 {{hazard.code}} 正在整改中，整改人：{{user.name}}

notificationTemplate.name: hazard_verified
notificationTemplate.title: 隐患待验收
notificationTemplate.content: 隐患 {{hazard.code}} 整改完成，等待验收

notificationTemplate.name: hazard_closed
notificationTemplate.title: 隐患已闭环
notificationTemplate.content: 隐患 {{hazard.code}} 已验收通过并闭环

notificationTemplate.name: permit_submitted
notificationTemplate.title: 作业票已提交
notificationTemplate.content: {{user.name}} 提交了作业票 {{permit.code}}，等待审批

notificationTemplate.name: permit_pending_approval
notificationTemplate.title: 作业票待审批
notificationTemplate.content: 作业票 {{permit.code}} 等待您审批（{{permit.currentStep}}）

notificationTemplate.name: permit_approved
notificationTemplate.title: 作业票已通过
notificationTemplate.content: 您提交的作业票 {{permit.code}} 已通过审批

notificationTemplate.name: permit_rejected
notificationTemplate.title: 作业票已驳回
notificationTemplate.content: 您提交的作业票 {{permit.code}} 已被驳回，请查看驳回原因

notificationTemplate.name: training_assigned
notificationTemplate.title: 培训任务已分配
notificationTemplate.content: 您有新的培训任务：{{task.title}}，请及时完成

notificationTemplate.name: training_updated
notificationTemplate.title: 培训任务已更新
notificationTemplate.content: 培训任务 {{task.title}} 已更新，请查看最新内容
